lead_paragraph: TOKYO, Saturday, Nov. 1 (U.P.) -- Japan is ready to undertake mediation of the Russo-German war if an opportunity can be found, the English language newspaper Japan Times Advertiser, which usually reflects the views of the Foreign Office, said today in an editorial.
abstract: Japan Times Advertiser urges Japanese-U S mediation
